mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') "date", b.user_no userNo, u.name userName FROM board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by b.no desc
select b.no, b.title, b.content, u.name userName, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') "date", b.user_no userNo from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}

SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') "date", b.user_no userNo, u.name userName FROM board b, users u
where b.user_no = u.no and b.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
or b.user_no = u.no and u.name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by b.no desc
